item.title: 斯里兰卡计划设立基金，从约 20 年来最严重的风暴中重建家园
item.description: 斯里兰卡总统阿努拉-库马拉-迪萨纳亚克（Anura Kumara Dissanayake）表示，斯里兰卡正在设立一个基金，以修复迪特瓦飓风造成的损失，因为这个岛国正面临着 "最大、最具挑战性的自然灾害"。【原文：Sri Lanka is setting up a fund to repair damage from Cyclone Ditwah as the island nation faces its “largest and most challenging natural disaster,” President Anura Kumara Dissanayake said.】

item.title: 增长降温，中国私营工厂指数意外下降
item.description: 一项民间调查显示，由于新订单几乎停滞，11 月份中国制造业活动出人意料地出现了四个月来的首次萎缩，这使得经济放缓加深的迹象更加令人担忧。【原文：China’s manufacturing activity surprisingly contracted in November for the first time in four months as new orders almost stalled, according to a private survey, adding to worrying signs about the economy’s deepening slowdown.】

item.title: S&P 称达纳塔拉筹资计划提高了财政灵活性
item.description: 据S&P全球评级公司称，印尼主权财富基金达纳塔拉（Danantara）的融资战略为政府管理其财政和庞大的国有企业提供了更大的灵活性。【原文：A strategy by Indonesian sovereign wealth fund Danantara to raise capital is offering the government more flexibility in managing its finances and sprawling state-owned firms, according to S&P Global Ratings.】

item.title: ASX 开始解决公司公告长达数小时的中断问题
item.description: 澳大利亚主要交易所运营商澳大利亚证券交易所有限公司（ASX Ltd.）在长达数小时的故障后恢复发布公司声明。【原文：Australia’s main exchange operator ASX Ltd. resumed publishing company statements after an hours-long outage.】

item.title: 印度交易商寄希望于印度央行购买债券推动经济增长
item.description: 印度的债券交易员们认为，随着当前的宽松周期接近尾声，印度央行将在未来几个月恢复购买国债，这一决定将刺激债券收益。【原文：Bond traders in India are positioning for the central bank to resume buying government debt in the coming months, a decision they say will spur gains as the current easing cycle approaches its end.】

item.title: 日本央行上田明确暗示 12 月加息的可能性
item.description: 日本央行行长上田一夫发出了迄今为止最明确的暗示，即日本央行董事会可能会在本月采取行动，并指出当局将就是否加息做出正确决定。【原文：Bank of Japan Governor Kazuo Ueda sent the clearest hint yet that his board might move this month, noting that authorities will make the right call on whether to raise interest rates or not.】

item.title: 万科风波后，中国房屋销售私人数据黯然失色
item.description: 在国家支持的中国万科公司（China Vanke Co.【原文：Two of China’s private data agencies skipped releasing data on monthly home sales by the country’s top developers, after state-backed China Vanke Co. stirred market concerns with its bond extension bid.】

item.title: 迪士尼《动物世界 2》在中国首映取得 2.72 亿美元的好成绩
item.description: 迪斯尼公司的《动物世界 2》（Zootopia 2）在中国取得了 2.72 亿美元的票房，成为中国有史以来第二大开画票房的外国电影，为美国制片厂在中国这一重要市场的发展注入了活力。【原文：Walt Disney Co.’s Zootopia 2 pulled in $272 million to claim China’s second-biggest opening ever for a foreign film, boosting the US studio in a key market.】

item.title: 周五伦敦金属交易所铜价创下历史新高后美国铜价上涨
item.description: 周五，铜在伦敦金属交易所创下历史新高后，在美国出现上涨，长达数小时的停牌加剧了供应紧张。【原文：Copper rose in the US after hitting a record high on the London Metal Exchange on Friday, with supply tightness exacerbated by an hours-long halt to trading.】

item.title: 日本两年期收益率因加息押注创 2008 年以来新高
item.description: 日本两年期国债收益率升至2008年以来的最高水平，日元兑美元汇率上涨，因为有迹象表明日本央行加息的脚步越来越近了。【原文：Japan’s two-year note yield rose to its highest level since 2008 and the yen gained against the dollar on signs an interest-rate hike by the Bank of Japan is getting closer.】

item.title: 关税逆风袭来，日本企业缩减投资规模
item.description: 日本企业在经历了连续五个季度的增长之后，在今年夏天缩减了资本支出，这是美国提高关税给萎靡不振的经济造成影响，企业情绪降温的一个迹象。【原文：Japanese businesses trimmed back capital spending over the summer after five straight quarters of gains, in a sign of cooling corporate sentiment as higher US tariffs take a toll on a sputtering economy.】

item.title: S.韩国出口因芯片和汽车行业的稳健增长而势头强劲
item.description: 受半导体和汽车需求强劲的提振，韩国 11 月份的出口保持稳健，这为应对全球保护主义浪潮的政策制定者提供了定心丸。【原文：South Korea’s exports remained solid in November, buoyed by robust demand for semiconductors and autos, offering reassurance for policymakers as they navigate a wave of global protectionism.】

item.title: 伦敦监管机构寻求更严格的数据中心规则来帮助住房建设
item.description: 伦敦政府的一个监督机构希望对数据中心的建设制定更严格的规定，并警告说，数据中心的电力需求可能会影响拥挤的首都新住宅的建设。【原文：A London government watchdog wants tougher rules on building data centers, warning that their power demands may impinge on the construction of new homes in the crowded capital.】

item.title: 动物世界》和《邪恶》暂时解除了好莱坞的阴霾
item.description: 我们回答读者关于电影、华纳兄弟、人工智能等方面的问题【原文：We answer readers’ questions about movies, Warner Bros., AI and more】

item.title: 中国股市抵御万科困境，科技股成为主要驱动力
item.description: 中国曾经最大的房地产开发商面临债务崩溃的威胁，但中国股市却表现出了顽强的生命力，这表明科技已成为市场的主要驱动力，而房地产现在几乎已成为边缘产业。【原文：The resilience of China’s stocks in the face of a threatened debt meltdown at what was once the nation’s biggest property developer shows tech has become the market’s main driver, while property is now almost peripheral.】

item.title: 白银在交易中断和供应紧张之后创下新纪录
item.description: 白银跃升至创纪录水平，巩固了上一交易日近 6% 的涨幅，当时的交易中断加剧了持续的供应紧张和对美国降息预期的升温。【原文：Silver jumped to a record, reinforcing a gain of nearly 6% in the previous session, when a trading outage added to ongoing supply tightness and rising expectations for an interest-rate cut in the US.】

item.title: 欧佩克+重申暂停制裁，重点关注委内瑞拉后，石油价格攀升
item.description: 在欧佩克+确认将坚持在第一季度暂停增产的计划后，石油上涨，而交易商则在权衡唐纳德-特朗普总统围绕委内瑞拉的言论所产生的影响。【原文：Oil rose after OPEC+ confirmed it will stick with plans to pause production hikes during the first quarter, while traders weighed the fallout from President Donald Trump’s rhetoric around Venezuela.】

item.title: 中国财报不佳令习近平结束通货紧缩的努力存疑
item.description: 中国政府遏制价格战和抑制通货紧缩的行动对第三季度盈利的提升作用甚微，这使得投资者缺乏催化剂，而中国股市的跌势已延续到第二个月。【原文：Beijing’s campaign to rein in price wars and blunt deflation has done little to lift third-quarter earnings, leaving investors short on catalysts as Chinese stocks extend their losses into a second month.】

item.title: 俄罗斯准备首次发行人民币债券，助推中国的雄心壮志
item.description: 俄罗斯正逐步接近其首次以人民币计价的主权债券销售，这有助于中国提高其货币的全球地位。【原文：Russia is inching closer to its first yuan-denominated sovereign bond sale, aiding China’s push to raise the global standing of its currency.】

item.title: 亚洲开市后将进入繁忙的一周：市场综述
item.description: 继上周五美国股市小幅上涨后，亚洲股市开盘表现相当平淡，交投清淡，投资者继续关注经济数据和美联储降息预期。【原文：Asian stocks were set for a fairly muted open following modest US gains on Friday amid thin trading as investors kept their focus on economic data and an expected Federal Reserve interest-rate cut.】

item.title: 2600 亿美元 "母婴基金 "扭曲信贷市场
item.description:
受个人投资者欢迎的固定期限基金正在囤积大公司的债务，降低借贷成本，但却掩盖了偿还风险。【原文：

Popular with individual investors, fixed-maturity funds are hoovering up the debt of big companies, reducing borrowing costs but obscuring repayment risk.

】

item.title: EQT 和 CVC Asia 放弃对 AUB 的 34 亿美元收购要约
item.description: EQT AB 和 CVC Asia Pacific Ltd. 取消了与 AUB Group Ltd. 就可能的收购要约进行的谈判，该要约对这家澳大利亚保险经纪公司的估值约为 52 亿澳元（34 亿美元）。【原文：EQT AB and CVC Asia Pacific Ltd. scrapped talks with AUB Group Ltd. about a possible takeover offer that had valued the Australian insurance broker at around A$5.2 billion ($3.4 billion).】

item.title: CyrusOne 称，CME 数据中心在故障后增加了更多冷却设备
item.description: 位于伊利诺伊州、为芝加哥商品交易所提供支持的数据中心，在上周五发生震惊全球市场的灾难性故障后，安装了后备冷却能力。【原文：The Illinois-based data center that supports the CME installed backup cooling capacity after a catastrophic outage that roiled world markets on Friday.】

item.title: 遏制儿童使用社交媒体的全球行动从澳大利亚开始
item.description:
对其他国家决策者的采访显示，他们正在密切关注澳大利亚的年龄禁令，并计划采取自己的措施来保护年轻用户。【原文：

Interviews with policymakers in other nations show they’re watching Australia’s age ban closely and planning moves of their own to protect young users.

】

item.title: 美联储竞选人哈塞特称市场已为特朗普主席人选做好准备
item.description: 白宫国家经济委员会主任凯文-哈塞特（Kevin Hassett）对唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）可能在今年年底前挑选下一任美联储主席的迹象作出了积极的市场反应，而总统的首席经济顾问被认为很有可能赢得这一职位。【原文：White House National Economic Council Director Kevin Hassett touted a positive market response to indications that Donald Trump could pick the next Federal Reserve chair before the end of the year — a job that the president’s chief economic adviser is seen as likely to win.】

item.title: 空中客车公司在今年最后几周面临宇宙干扰
item.description: 随着空中客车公司（Airbus SE）进入今年的最后一个月，这家欧洲飞机制造商正努力实现雄心勃勃的飞机交付目标，它发现自己面临着一个突如其来的新挑战。【原文：As Airbus SE enters the last month of the year trying to meet an ambitious aircraft delivery target, the European planemaker finds itself confronted with a fresh challenge that’s come out of the blue.】

item.title: 欧佩克+坚持在 2026 年初暂停增产的计划
item.description: 在全球石油市场出现越来越多过剩迹象的情况下，欧佩克+将坚持在第一季度暂停增产的计划。【原文：OPEC+ will stick with plans to pause production increases during the first quarter, amid growing signs of a surplus in global oil markets.】

item.title: 挪威预算谈判未果，内阁危机风险增大
item.description: 挪威执政党工党未能获得其所有政治伙伴对明年预算的支持，这使其在连任仅三个月后就面临政府危机的前景。【原文：Norway’s ruling Labor Party failed to secure backing for next year’s budget from all its political partners, raising the prospect of a government crisis just three months after its reelection.】

item.title: 意大利博罗梅奥家族列出岛屿清单，力争与科莫湖相媲美
item.description: 意大利博罗梅奥（Borromeo）家族正在将其持有的房地产，包括马焦雷湖（Lake Maggiore）上的一组岛屿上市，试图将该地区打造成一个旅游和商业中心，与附近的科莫湖相媲美。【原文：Italy’s Borromeo family is listing its real estate holdings including a group of islands on Lake Maggiore as it seeks to turn the area into a tourism and business hub to rival nearby Lake Como.】

item.title: 欧佩克+将就密切关注的产能审查机制达成协议
item.description: 预计欧佩克+成员国将就即将进行的各自石油生产能力审查程序达成一致，这将有助于确定 2027 年的产量配额。【原文：OPEC+ members are expected to agree on a procedure for an upcoming review of their individual oil production capacities, which will help set output quotas in 2027.】
